reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Because of increased climate changes, Cambodia, have had severe floodings and drought. The purpose is to give the farmers practical knowledge in Integrated Farming System (IFS), which focus on how to handle the climate change and how to be able to provide for themselves and their families. Groups of 25 persons will be formed, and every group will get access to poultry and seeds for farming. The local partner for this project is CHAD (Community Health and Agricultural Development). The organisation has many years of experience in the work field and therefore we cooperate with them.
